help.title: ğŸ› ï¸ Help Menu
help.description:
Hello! I'm {displayName}, a bot created by {owner}.
You can use `{prefix} help <command>` to get more information about a command.
help.footer: Use {prefix} help <command> for more information about a command
help.no_commands: No commands found. Please check the command folder structure.

prefix.title: Current Prefix
prefix.change_guide: To change the prefix, use: `{prefix}prefix <new prefix>`
prefix.no_permission_desc: You need **Manage Server** permission to change the prefix!
prefix.invalid_length_desc: Prefix cannot be longer than 10 characters!
prefix.invalid_chars_desc: Prefix cannot contain spaces or newline characters!
prefix.updated_desc:
Server prefix has been changed from `{oldPrefix}` to `{newPrefix}`

You can now use commands with the new prefix: `{newPrefix}ping`
prefix.note_desc: The new prefix will take effect immediately for all users in this server.
prefix.error_desc: An error occurred while processing the command. Please try again later!
